__e: Last Friday I came home, and there's a message on my machine... from my boyfriend, who... says that we shouldn't be together anymore.
We pulled this message off the victim's answering machine.
All right. Well, we left a message at your mom's house.
We can also prove he played the messages on the stolen phone's voicemail.
There was a weird message on the office voicemail this morning.
"Hi, this is Big Bob. Why, I'm not in right now but, at the beep, leave your name and your penis size!"
